head.title: World Briefing | Americas: Canada: Office For Native Claims Urged

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Law Enforcement and Security

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Americas: Canada: Office For Native Claims Urged

abstract.p: Inquiry into shooting death of Dudley George, aboriginal man, in Ontario, Canada, by police during land claim protest in 1995 calls on government to establish independent land claims agency to settle growing number of claims by Native Canadians; inquiry comes as Native leaders are threatening blockades and occupations this summer to protest 1,100 unsettled claims across country (S)

block.p: An inquiry into the shooting death by the police of an aboriginal man during a land claim protest in 1995 called on the government to establish an independent land claims agency to settle a growing number of claims by Native Canadians. The protester, Dudley George, was shot by a police sniper during the protest in Ontario. The inquiry's report comes as Native leaders are threatening rail blockades and occupations this summer to protest more than 1,100 unsettled claims across the country.

An inquiry into the shooting death by the police of an aboriginal man during a land claim protest in 1995 called on the government to establish an independent land claims agency to settle a growing number of claims by Native Canadians. The protester, Dudley George, was shot by a police sniper during the protest in Ontario. The inquiry's report comes as Native leaders are threatening rail blockades and occupations this summer to protest more than 1,100 unsettled claims across the country.
